text.section:
A public safety solicitor may not solicit public safety contributions unless the script of an oral solicitation and a copy of a written solicitation:
is approved by the public safety organization on whose behalf the public safety contribution is solicited; and
includes:
the specific purpose that is to be advanced with public safety contributions; and
a statement that the person is soliciting on behalf of a public safety organization.
A copy of the approved script of an oral solicitation and a copy of a written solicitation shall be made available to the Secretary of State upon request.
